description: Ingredients: 1 cup dried chickpeas | 1/2 cup onion, chopped | 1 cup parsley | 1 small green chile pepper, serrano or jalapeno pepper | 3 garlic cloves | 1 tsp cumin | 1 tsp salt | 1/2 tsp cardamom | 1/4 tsp black pepper | 2 tbsp chickpea flour | 1/2 tsp baking soda | avocado oil for frying
name: Falafel

description: Ingredients: Lettuce | Cucumber | Tomatoes | Bell pepper | Kalamata olives | Pepperoncini | Garbanzo beans | Feta cheese | Za’atar Lemon vinaigrette
name: Greek Salad

description: Ingredients: 1/4 cup (60ml) Extra virgin olive oil |1 Onion, finely chopped | 4 Garlic cloves, thinly sliced | 3/4 cup (210g) Tomato paste | 1/2 cup (125ml) Vodka | 1/4 cup (60ml) Thickened cream |1/2 cup (40g) Finely grated parmesan | 400g Rigatoni, cooked to packet instructions | 1/4 cup (60ml) Cooking water reserved
name: Tomato Vodka Rigatoni

description: Ingredients: 1 cup Dried Chickpeas | 1 cup Maitake mushrooms | 1/2 cup Chopped onions | 1 Tbs onion &garlic powder | 1/2 Tbs salt & black pepper | 1tsp Cumin | 1tsp Old Bay | 1tsp Paprika | 1/2 tsp coriander
name: Veggie Burgers

description: Ingredients: Brown Rice | Broccoli | Kale | Spinach | Carrots | Maitake mushroooms | Onions | Choice of Sauce
name: Vegetable Stir Fry

description: Ingredients: 1 glass ready cherry tomatoes, or 2-3 ready plum tomatoes, coarsely slashed | 2 Tbsp of your choice of onions | 1 medium clove of garlic | 1 little jalapeño | 1 Tbsp olive oil | 1/4 glass crisp cilantro | lime juice | squeeze of salt | add your choice of poblano, chipotle, red ringer pepper, pineapple or mango
name: Fresh Tasty Salsa

description: Ingredients: 1 cup grain rice | 1 can chickpeas | 4-5 diced portobello mushrooms | cilantro or parsley | 1/2 cup of hot sauce | 1/4 cup balsalmic vinaigrette
name: Sauteed Chickpeas and Rice

description: Ingredients: 1 bunch of baby carrots | 2 handfuls of Green Beans top and tailed | 1 large Onion cut into 8 wedges | 15 fresh Cherry Tomatoes halved | 3 sprigs Thyme | 1tsp Dried Onion flakes | 1tsp Dried Sage leaves | 1/2 tsp coarse Celtic sea salt or to taste | 1/8 tsp Black Pepper | 1/4 tsp chili flakes |200ml Vegetable Broth | 1tsp Tamari or soy sauce
name: Roasted Garden Vegetables

description: 6-8 medium Yukon gold potatoes (if large, cut in half) | 1 tsp Sea Salt (divided) | Water to cover | 1/2 tsp Sea Salt | 1/2 tsp Ground Black Pepper | 5-6 cloves raw or roasted Garlic (or sub minced garlic sautéed for 3 minutes in olive oil) | 3-4 Tbsp Vegan Butter (such as Earth Balance // melted/softened) | 1/4 cup Fresh Chives (for topping, optional)
name: Vegan Garlic Mashed Potatoes

description: Ingredients: 12 oz. bag cauliflower rice (frozen) | 4 cups stir fry veggies (frozen) | 2 Tbsp sesame oil | 1 Tbsp onion flakes | 1 tsp garlic powder | 1/2 tsp crushed red pepper | 2 large eggs | 1/4 cup tamari or soy sauce | salt/pepper to taste
name: Cauliflower Fried Rice

description: Ingredients: 4 salmon filets | 2 Tbsp olive oil | 1/2 cup barbecue sauce | 2 Tbsp maple syrup | 1 tsp garlic powder | 1/8 tsp cayenne (optional) | salt/pepper (to taste)
name: Maple Barbecue Salmon

description: Ingredients: 2 salmon filets (medium) | 1/4 cup jasmine rice, dry | 1 Tbsp sesame oil | 1/2 lemon (juiced) | 2 Tbsp soy sauce (or tamari) | 1 Tbsp hoisin sauce | 1/4 cup teriyaki sauce | 1 tsp ground ginger | 1 tsp ground pepper | 2 cups broccoli (chopped)
name: Baked Teriyaki Salmon

description: 1/4 recipe Creamy Garlic Mashed Red Potatoes (made in advance) | 1 Tbsp avocado oil | 1 cup baby carrots | 2 cups mushrooms | 2 cups spinach
name: Loaded Mashed Potato Bowl

description: Ingredients: 3 cups Baby Spinach | 1 Tbsp Finely chopped red onion | 1/2 cup Sliced Strawberries | 2 Tbsp vinaigrette | 1/4 medium Avocado, diced | 2 Tbsp toasted walnut pieces
name: Strawberry Spinach Salad with Avocado & Walnuts

description: Ingredients: 6oz dried farfalle (bow-tie pasta) | 1 Tbsp olive oil | 1 medium onion, chopped | 1 cup sliced portobello or other fresh mushrooms | 2 cloves garlic, minced | 4 cup thinly sliced fresh spinach | 1 tsp snipped fresh thyme | 1/8 tsp pepper | 2 Tbsp shredded Parmesan cheese
name: Farfalle with Mushrooms and Spinach

description: Ingredients: 2 Salmon filets, thawed | 1/4 tsp Crushed Garlic | 1/4 tsp Oregano | 1/4 tsp Paprika | 1/8 tsp Cayenne | 1 tsp Black Pepper | 1/8 tsp Sea Salt | 4 Corn tortillas | 1 cup Shredded Red Cabbage | 1/4 cup Corn, canned | 1 Tbsp Cilantro (optional)
name: Blackened Salmon Tacos

description: Ingredients: Bunch of Power Greens(Kale & Spinach) | 1 cup of Mushrooms | 1/4 Onion (chopped) | 2 Zucchini (medium) | 1 Summer Squash (medium) | 15 oz. Whole Tomatoes (canned) | 10 oz. Tomato sauce | 1/2 tsp Garlic powder | 1/2 tsp Dried Parsley | 1 tsp dried Basil | 6 uncooked Lasagna Noodles | 10 oz. Cottage Cheese (small curd) | 1/2 cup Parmesan (grated) | 1 cup mozzarella (shredded) | salt/pepper
name: The BEST Easy Healthy Lasagna Recipe

description: Ingredients: 4 Pita Bread | 6 oz Tomato sauce | 2 Small Tomatoes | 1 cup Lettuce | 3/4 cup fresh basil | 6 oz . fresh mozzarella
name: 10-Minute Margherita Pita Bread Pizzas

description: Ingredients: 1 Large Avocado | 1/2 cup Spinach leaves | 1/4 cup Olive Oil | 1/4 cup unsweetened Cashew Milk | 2 tsp Dried Basil | 1 tsp Garlic Powder | Salt/Pepper (to taste)
name: 10-Minute Avocado Pasta Sauce

description: Ingredients: For the Grain - Seasoned Quinoa | White or Brown Rice (season like the quinoa) | Farro | Bulgur Wheat |Millet || For the grain bowl - 2 15oz can chickpeas | 2 small garlic cloves | 2 Tbsp olive oil | 1/2 tsp smoked paprika or regular paprika | 1 tsp kosher salt | 1 recipe Tahini Sauce | 1 pint cherry tomatoes | 1 English cucumber | ½ cup Kalamata olives (optional) | 1/4 red onion
name: Easy Grain Bowl

description: Ingredients: 2 cups cooked Spanish Rice (or 2 cups cooked rice mixed with salsa, to taste) | 2 large portobello mushroom caps | 1/2 Medium Red Onion | 1 orange bell pepper | 2 15oz cans black beans, drained and rinsed | 2 Tbsp olive oil | 2 Tsp cumin | 1 Tsp garlic powder | 1 Tsp onion powder | 1 Tsp smoked paprika | 1 Tsp kosher salt | 2 Tbsp lime juice | 1 avocado | 4 large flour tortillas or gluten-free tortillas
name: Vegan Burrito
